targets.rawSql: select valores as temperature,$__time(date) from tempout  where  $Temp_out = 'Temp_out' and $__timeFilter(date)

select valores as windSpeed,$__time(date) from windspeed  where $wind_speed = 'Wind_Speed' AND $__timeFilter(date)
#select Wind, date as time from datos where $wind_speed = 'Wind_Speed' AND $__timeFilter(date)

select valores as solarRad,$__time(date) from solarrad where $solar_rad = 'solar_rad' and $__timeFilter(date);
#select Solar_Rad,date as time from datos where $solar_rad = 'solar_rad'  and $__timeFilter(date)

select valores as humedad,$__time(date) from humout  where $hum_out = 'hum_out' AND $__timeFilter(date) ;
#select Hum_Out,date as time from datos where $hum_out = 'hum_out' AND $__timeFilter(date)

select valores as rain,$__time(date) from Rain where $rain = 'rain' AND $__timeFilter(date)
#select Rain,date as time from datos where $rain = 'rain' AND $__timeFilter(date)
#select valores as winDir, $__time(date) from winddir   where $wind_dir = 'wind_dir' AND $__timeFilter(date)
select valores as presion,$__time(date) from presion  where  $presion = 'presion' and $__timeFilter(date)

SELECT valores as temperatura, $__time(date) FROM tempout WHERE $__timeFilter(date) 
#select TempOut, date as time from data

#SELECT date, value FROM h2olock.solar_radiation
select valores, $__time(date) from tempout where $__timeFilter(date)

#SELECT date as time, value FROM h2olock.line_loads
select valores as rain, $__time(date) from rain where $__timeFilter(date)

#SELECT date as time, value FROM h2olock.humidity
select valores, $__time(date) from humout where $__timeFilter(date)

#SELECT date, value FROM h2olock.solar_radiation
select valores, $__time(date) from solarrad where $__timeFilter(date)

select s.valores as direccion, $__time(s.date), v.valores as speed 
from winddir s 
inner join windspeed v 
on s.date = v.date 
where $__timeFilter(v.date)

#SELECT value as temperature, date FROM h2olock.temperature
SELECT TempOut ,TempIn, date as time from datos

#SELECT value as solar_radiation, date FROM h2olock.solar_radiation
#SELECT `temp_in`, date as time from data
